name: Tutti's World
description:
Controls: Left Mouse Button = Jump/Fly, Backspace = go back to menu

Fun challenging game where you help Tutti explore different worlds.

2 Modes:
-Tutti Run
-Tutti Fly

5 Worlds:
-Fruit World
-Chocolate World
-Bubble Gum World
-Old World
-Water World

100 Levels!

Cute Character :)

Touch/Tap Controls
